BBEX3.A.LYD.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Libya  / EUR 1 = LYD ... (buying)
Source: Central Bank of Libya, Tripolis
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2002: On 1 January 2002, the Libyan dinar was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate) for this date:  EUR 1 = LYD 1.151010 / 1.156780  Calculated devaluation against the rates recorded at end-December 2001: 50.3%

Comment on 2003: On 15 June 2003, the exchange rates were adjusted more sharply. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate):  14 June 2003: EUR 1 = LYD 1.356054 / 1.362852  15 June 2003: EUR 1 = LYD 1.593941 / 1.601931  Calculated devaluation: 14.9%
